HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Looking for the latest in free streaming and movie trailers? We’ve got you covered with daily updates, smooth navigation every new release.

Key Features:

This app is designed for true movie lovers who want quick access to trailers and updates without any hassle. Perfect for staying up to date with new movies and blockbusters in one place.

https://peterjosephapps.blogspot.com/2025/08/privacy-policy.html

Сканворды на русском языке без всяких сомнений уникальное явление в мире. Ни на каком другом языке вы не найдете столько литературных вопросов, вопросов с юмором, вопросов с контекстом происходящего в мире сегодня. И всё это в обычных кроссвордах, хотя, казалось бы, какая ерунда. Русский народ – народ слова. И любит своё слово, и держит своё слово, и относится к слову как к самому дорогому.

Сканворды в приложении разнообразные - попроще и посложнее, с фотографиями, с классическими вопросами или ассоциативными: «одним словом» либо «раз слово, два слово», как подсказки старца Фура. В любом журнале есть один англо-русский сканворд и один «дыркавнос», надеюсь, вы поймёте, почему его так назвали. На каждой странице вас встречает персонаж нашей весёлой семейки. Присоединяйтесь!

Все сканворды для читателя бесплатны. Это годовая коллекция: 52-53 номера по 20 сканвордов в каждом. Полный годовой арсенал сканвордов «съест» на телефоне около 50 Мбайт - картинки маленькие, текст - это текст. Мы ценим место на вашем телефоне.

Интернет для разгадывания не нужен. При условии, что сами сканворды уже на вашем телефоне. Каждую пятницу выходит новый номер журнала. Если вы оставили активной опцию «уведомление», то один раз в неделю в пятницу в 12-00 по местному времени придёт напоминание о новом номере. При входе в приложение загрузка нового журнала происходит автоматически и при её успешном завершении более не повторяется. Кроме того, можно загрузить или удалить на телефон поштучно любой из журналов, либо через «Настройки» скачать все журналы в один клик.

Основные возможности, в том числе доступ ко всем сканвордам, в приложении для читателя бесплатны. Банкет оплачивает рекламодатель. Ему разрешено иметь один узкий баннер на каждой странице + один показ межстраничной рекламы перед открытием сканворда. Наш рекламодатель не прерывает процесс разгадывания. Также рекламодатель щедро награждает читателя бесплатными подсказками за просмотр своих роликов. 

Любой читатель вправе, но не обязан, «перебить» рекламодателя, и: а) отключить рекламу навсегда, б) оформить подписку, которая на срок подписки отключает рекламу и даёт неограниченные подсказки, в) набрать подсказок на развес. Все эти возможности представлены на витрине в «Магазине».

Подписка - стандартный механизм Apple. 
1) Подписка возможна на три срока - неделя, месяц или год.
2) Подписка автоматически продлеваемая. Средства за возобновление подписки будут взиматься в течение 24 часов до конца текущего периода. 
3) Подписка подключается или отключается стандартно через iTunes, ссылка управления внизу. При желании отказаться от возобновления подписки пользователю необходимо это сделать не позднее, чем за 24 часа до конца текущего периода. При этом оплаченный период подписки отработает до конца. 

Политика конфиденциальности https://scanword.ru/privacy.html
Условия пользования https://scanword.ru/terms.html
Управление подпиской https://support.apple.com/ru-ru/HT202039

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

“Great app, excellent journalism! The Economist is wonderful. The content is interesting and relevant and the reporting is superlative. Equally impressive is the drive to stay relevant by presenting media in multiple formats, from print to podcasts and short videos.”

“Impeccable journalism with an app to match. The Economist doesn’t need my endorsement of the quality of their journalism. It speaks for itself. Rather, I’ll comment that their app is well-designed and refreshing to use…I love being able to easily download entire editions, listen to articles with real narrators and search for past articles.”

Full terms of use: https://www.economist.com/legal/terms-of-use
Our privacy policy: https://www.economist.com/privacy

Craft - Music Learning & Creation Craft is an intuitive music learning app designed for beginners and music enthusiasts. Explore virtual instruments, develop your rhythm skills, and compose original melodies. Key Features: Instrument Studio Play six virtual instruments including Piano, Drums, Guitar, Xylophone, Marimba, and Bells. Each instrument features authentic sound synthesis and responsive touch controls. Song Composer Create original compositions with an intuitive note-by-note interface. Select your instrument, add notes to build melodies, and save your musical creations. Rhythm Challenge Improve your timing and rhythm skills through interactive challenges. Follow visual patterns and tap along to develop your musical sense. Sound Explorer Experiment with professional audio effects including reverb, echo, and distortion. Select from curated sound packs to discover unique sonic textures. Music Journey Track your progress with detailed statistics. Unlock achievements as you play notes, create compositions, and master different instruments. Learning Features:
- Real-time audio synthesis for authentic instrument sounds
- Visual feedback for improved learning
- Progress tracking and achievement system
- Adaptive difficulty for rhythm challenges
- Intuitive interface designed for all skill levels

developer: BUNDLE HABER BILISIM TEKNOLOJI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Bundle is the most comprehensive and top-rated free news aggregator that brings together all the latest news you need to know throughout the day. With Bundle, you have everything you shouldn't miss at your fingertips, featuring top headlines, breaking news, and a multitude of sources across different interest areas such as the stock market, science and technology, finance, sports, and politics.

• My Bundle - Ready to be added to your personal collection for free from over 10,000 news sources, online publishers, magazines, newspapers, opinion pieces, and blogs from 18 different countries. Stay informed and inspired by leading publications such as The Guardian, TIME, The New York Times, Business Insider, Bloomberg, Mashable, and more!

• Breaking news – With Bundle, you receive instant notifications for the day's most important developments and standout headlines, ensuring you stay informed before anyone else in a refined, accurate, and unbiased manner.

• Save time by summarizing news – Utilize Bundle AI, the productive artificial intelligence developed by Bundle, to summarize news content with just one touch. Instead of reading the entire news, you can quickly get to the most important points.

• Escape clickbait headlines – Bundle AI organizes deceptive and non-informative news headlines used by some outlets to gain more clicks, making the headlines more understandable for users.

• Unique search feature – Bundle provides instant results based on the keywords you search for. Easily search through all news, headlines, authors, and more.

• Reader Mode – If ads on the page of the media outlet you follow distract you, you can focus solely on content by switching to Reader Mode.

• Offline Mode – Whether you're on the subway or in a dead zone, you can continue reading all the content loaded into your news feed even if your connection is lost.

• Latest news – Bundle delivers the latest news to users instantly. With Bundle, you'll be the first to know the most popular and important news from various categories such as technology, sports, politics, economy, and science, tailored to your interests.

• The world at your fingertips – Read news and content from 18 different countries, including the UK, France, Germany, and worldwide, to stay informed about local agendas.

• Go beyond the agenda – With Hot Bundle, featuring the daily selections of Bundle editors, you access the most engaging, inspiring, and mind-opening content.

• Don't lose, save it – If you can't find time to read a piece of news immediately, save it and read it at your convenience.

• Easy to use, hard to let go – With Bundle's award-winning design and user-friendly interface, you can easily access the news you want and glance through all of it at once. If your internet quota is limited, you can turn off news images or use the dark theme option if white light strains your eyes. Log in with your social media account to synchronize your saved news and followed sources across all your devices.

Terms of Use and Privacy Agreement: https://www.bundletheworld.com/mobileapp/termsofuse/en

In addition to all of this, you can follow all developments related to both current events and Bundle on our Facebook, Instagram, and X accounts! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bundlenews/ X: https://twitter.com/bundleapp/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bundlehaber/

We would be delighted to hear any suggestions, comments, and questions you may have about Bundle: You can always reach us through the "Settings>Send Feedback" section in the app and at support@bundlenews.co. For more information, you can visit our website: www.bundle.app/en

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking

With ITV, your window to occuring around and entertainment is just a tap away!

Listen AI: Unveiling the Power of Text-to-Speech

Turn Text into Speech and Open Your Ears to the Written Word

Listen AI isn't just a text-to-speech tool, it's your effortless companion for a world of information, narrated at your pace. Here's how Listen AI elevates your experience:

Unmatched Vocal Majesty: Immerse yourself in a variety of crystal-clear, expressive voices that blur the line between human and machine. Choose from a range of accents and personalities to find the perfect narrator for any content, be it a casual blog post or a formal report.

Customization at Your Fingertips: Tailor your listening experience to your preferences. Adjust the speaking rate to match your comprehension speed, or fine-tune the volume for optimal comfort.

Effortless Integration: Forget copy-pasting. Listen AI seamlessly converts text from documents and web pages into spoken content. Highlight a passage on a website, a section in a PDF, or an entire document, and Listen AI will bring it to life with its captivating narration.

Multitasking Masterclass: Free up your eyes and ears for other activities. Listen to articles, web pages, and PDFs while you exercise, commute, cook, or complete chores. Listen AI lets you learn and stay informed while you conquer your to-do list.

Accessibility Champion: Listen AI is a game-changer for those with visual impairments or learning disabilities. Reading lengthy documents or educational materials can be a challenge. Listen AI transforms text into an engaging audio experience, making learning and information access more accessible than ever before.

Listen AI: It's not just reading, it's experiencing.

Terms and Conditions: https://static.listenai.app/terms-conditions-en.html
Privacy Policy: https://static.listenai.app/privacy-en.html
Community Guidelines: https://static.listenai.app/community-guidelines-en.html

Get all your news in one place on an eye-opening platform that shows you the bias, reliability and ownership of every source you read. Cut through the noise and escape media echo chambers with Ground News.

Ground News is the largest news aggregator in the world with over 50K news sources and 60K articles added daily. But we aren’t a typical news aggregator, throwing hundreds of headlines at you that barely skim the surface. Ground frees people from algorithmic restraints, illuminates blindspots and makes media bias explicit with our one-of-a-kind media analysis features.

AVOID MANIPULATIVE ALGORITHMS
SPOT MEDIA  BIAS
DISCOVER BLINDSPOTS
CHECK THE RELIABILITY OF SOURCES
SEE WHO OWNS THE NEWS YOU CONSUME

Read daily breaking stories from sources around the world, in real time. Like a modern day newspaper, we show you diverse stories instead of algorithm-driven content that can limit your worldview. News coverage is rarely unbiased, so we give you as much context as possible so you can come to your own conclusions. Compare coverage on partisan topics like politics, and elections.

Enjoy our free features, or subscribe for in-depth analysis that will transform the way you look at news.


About Your Ground News Subscription:

With this app, everything Le Monde has to offer is in one place. 
- Keep up with the news via our homepage, curated by Le Monde in English journalists.

We’ve included a number of features to enhance your reading experience.

Le Monde in English delivers in-depth and reliable news coverage on a wide-range of topics:
- News from France, Europe and the world.
- The latest news across our many sections: Environment, Business, Politics, Investigations, and more.
- Along with coverage on sports, technology, science, culture, and the arts.

When you subscribe to Le Monde in English, you are supporting an independent newsroom of over 530 journalists, and benefitting from unlimited access to Le Monde in English content, on the website and the app.

VOGUE ist Synonym für Mode und Stil, Lebensfreude und Genuss – einflussreich und stilbildend.
Monat für Monat inszeniert VOGUE in einzigartiger journalistischer und ästhetischer Qualität das Beste aus der internationalen Modewelt, präsentiert neue Talente und Trends.
VOGUE trifft die Experten der Beautybranche und berichtet über neueste Forschungsergebnisse und Produktentwicklungen. Got a growing TBR list? See great book recommendations, but forget them later? Meet TBR Bookshelf!

Easily track books you want to read, are currently reading, or have finished with no limits. Rate and review books once you’ve read them and log your favorite moments using our quick and intuitive rating system. Browse public ratings to see a book’s POV, tropes, reread rate, and up to four genre-specific ratings. For example, Romance tracks Spice, Fluff, Humor, and Tear. All ratings are anonymous, so you can be honest with your reviews.

Within our rating system, you can log:
* Reading format
* 5 Star Rating including half stars
* Up to four genre ratings
* If you would reread a book
* DNF (Did Not Finish)
* Favorite characters and quotes
* Series and standalone books
* Pro quotes and annotations (Paid Subscription Required)
* Any additional thoughts about the book
Celebrate your reading milestones with special book confetti and earn stickers for completing books and certain book tropes.
Exclusive Pro features include:
* Book tropes
* Book playlists to track songs (cannot be played within the app)
* POV format and amount
* TV show and movie adaptation ratings
* Four seasonal ratings
All users can create custom yearly reading goals. When you finish a book, it is automatically added to your yearly reading goal bookshelf. Pro users can also fully customize their bookshelves with color themes, bookshelf items, and layouts.

TBR Bookshelf makes managing your TBR list fun, easy, and satisfying. Track books, set reading goals, log quotes, and discover new reads all in one place. With customizable shelves, anonymous ratings, and a supportive community, staying on top of your reading has never been more enjoyable.

Join TBR Bookshelf, a woman-owned and operated company, BookTok’s favorite, and trusted by millions of readers.

TBR Bookshelf is free to download and use. No account or sign-up is required. TBR Bookshelf Pro includes a 7-day free trial and then options for a monthly plan ($4.99), a 6-month plan ($19.99), or a yearly plan ($29.99). All other features remain free indefinitely.

A subscription will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of your free trial. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime in your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary.

Note: This app is for tracking your reading journey. Reading is not available within the app.

Privacy Policy: http://jordanpetersonstudio.com/tbr-bookshelf-privacy-policy/ Terms of Service: http://jordanpetersonstudio.com/tbr-bookshelf-terms-of-service/

app_name: Merfi AI: AI Text To Speech
description:
Are you looking for a powerful app to turn your voice into text or bring text to life with audio?

Look no further than SpeechIT!
This all-in-one speech and text assistant makes it easier than ever to transcribe, listen, and even scan documents to read them aloud in real-time. Perfect for anyone who wants quick and efficient speech-to-text, real-time transcription, and the ability to turn written content into audio!

Key Features of SpeechIT:
1. Real-Time Transcription
Seamlessly transcribe lectures, meetings, or personal notes with live, accurate conversion from voice to text.

2. High Voice-to-Text Accuracy
Powered by advanced AI technology to ensure highly accurate and reliable transcriptions.

3. Customizable Text-to-Audio Settings
Choose from various voices and set your preferred reading speed for a personalized experience.

4. Document Scanning with Read-Aloud Feature
Scan printed or digital documents, and let SpeechIT read them aloud for hands-free convenience.

5. User-Friendly Interface
Effortlessly navigate with a clean, intuitive design tailored for a smooth user experience.

Why Choose SpeechIT?
Welcome to SpeechIT!
Our app is here to make voice-to-text and text-to-speech conversion simple and effective for everyone—from students and professionals to content creators and those with accessibility needs. With SpeechIT, you can not only transcribe live speech but also scan documents or web pages and instantly hear them read aloud, making your everyday tasks more manageable and productive.

Getting Started with SpeechIT:
1. Real-Time Transcription
Capture spoken words and transcribe them into editable text in real-time. Whether it’s a lecture, meeting, or personal memo, SpeechIT provides fast, accurate transcription that you can save, share, or revisit anytime.

2. Text-to-Audio
Transform written text into lifelike speech to read on the go. Simply type or paste in your text, choose your preferred voice, and let SpeechIT do the rest, giving you high-quality audio that sounds natural.

3. Scan & Read
Effortlessly scan documents or web pages and have them read aloud. Perfect for multi-page documents or when you need hands-free reading, SpeechIT makes complex reading tasks more accessible and efficient.

4. Document Storage & Organization
Organize and save your transcriptions and audio files for easy access. SpeechIT allows you to keep your files at your fingertips, whether for review, editing, or sharing.

Why Wait? Try SpeechIT Today!
Download SpeechIT now and enjoy seamless voice-to-text conversion, interactive document scanning, and top-notch text-to-speech functionality. Make SpeechIT your ultimate assistant for all your speech transcription and text-to-audio needs!

Subscription Information:
Unlock all premium features by subscribing to SpeechIT. Flexible subscription plans are available:

Monthly Subscription: $19.99
Annual Subscription: $99.99

Subscription Renewal:
Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Manage your subscription through the App Store settings to cancel anytime.

Terms of Service: https://sites.google.com/view/photowizz/terms

Get feedback on your work, share your favorite science fiction or adventure stories, and explore a treasure trove of fantasy and romance novels.

Discover indie novels from promising writers
Explore a new niche like mafia romances, fantasy adventures, or your favorite fanfiction
Download books to read offline anytime

Become the Next Blockbuster 
Inkitt is the world’s first reader-powered publisher, connecting readers with new books, captivating novels, and extraordinary stories. Our platform is home to romance, adventure, and fantasy gems waiting to be discovered. Indie authors who shine can gain opportunities for publication or adaptations, making their books accessible to fans worldwide.
